What a sorry excuse for a sequel. Filled with predatory monetization, lack of in game features, and balance in the pvp realm. While it takes 3-5 weeks for a competitive pvp balance change to come in, you bet your bottom dollar if there was a bug with the store it would get fixed in a few hours ( has happened many times since launch)
I really bought this game at full price back in 2018. Hell I preordered it. This game fucking sucks now, LMAO

You know things are bad when Blizzard puts their products on steam.

Sadly this game is a husk of its former self.

Hey guys wanna a play a actually welcoming game that doesn't get crapped on every second. 
Dont wanna pay 20$ for a skin 
Want to have actual affordable prices on cosmetics that doesn't scam you out of your money
Well let me Introduce you to "Team Fortress 2" Here you can where funny hats.
Don't you hate having to learn every single character in OW. Ever had a teammate say "Hey can you switch to Tweedle Dumb your kinda bad." But you don't know how to play that specific character. So then you get hated by the whole team and they report you for being a dummy not knowing how to play. 
Well in Team Fortress 2 you can play any class you want and not be bullied for not knowing how to play a character. You can pick any class such as, Heavy, Scout, Demoman, Spy, Pyro, Sniper, Soldier, Medic, and Engineer.

Want to have an ACTUAL good time... well then start downloading "Team Fortress 2 " and we will see you there.
https://store.steampowered.com/app/440/Team_Fortress_2/
I hope this game can make a comeback... Not sure they can though with how things are going. I only play when I have a drink now since it is the only way I can have fun in it.

i only downloaded and opened this soulless slop so i can give it a negative review

I had to do a 60 question recaptcha to play, 20 math questions and 40 audio tests with audio of people pissing, scottish people saying words in the most monotone voice possible, rain on metal and plastic roofs, white noise from a grocery store, and quite possibly the worst music known to man. Once I got into the game my eyes started to hurt. That's more of a personal issue, but this is also my review. 

Jokes aside, I played OW1 when it first came out, even before I had this steam account, but the shadow of a good, polished game just starts to slip away the more you try to enjoy it.

I was one of the people who watched those cinematics, someone who was excited to see what this game could have become. Someone who believed in the overly positive outlook on the future overwatch showed. Reinhardt was the coolest character to me, and I fantasized about the world Blizzard had made. But now I just feel kind of sad, bitter for the people who believed in this, in what overwatch could have been. I watched sojurns new cinematic, and I LOVED it! so much character, still some of the best animation in the business, but it's effects are tainted by what this company has done.

I'm not even going to lie! initally when the game first came out I was one of the immature fucks that compared it to TF2, who hated that they stole so many ideas, but now I find myself here, hating that I was right, hating that my petty belief that TF2 would somehow outlast overwatch came to be true. TF2 is still my favourite game, but I didn't want it to be like this.

And it sucks! the game is still there! I played five matches and I could TASTE it, the spectre of a premium competitive experience, but it slips through your hands so easily.

the game is still fairly fun if you have buds to play with, but I won't be there for it.

I've played Overwatch since the very beginning of OW1, and also waited for years for a PVE Campaign that was promised to us all.

F*ck Bobby, F*ck Aaron Keller and F*ck all those who defended and continue to defend Blizzard. Have fun wasting all your money on a company who will delete your game and sell it back to you. ( Í¡Â° ÍœÊ– Í¡Â°)
If you don't mind being in a toxic relationship, this game is for you.

tengo mas de 4000 horas invertidas en este juego, es muy divertido, lastima la comunidad q se formo cuando paso a ser gratis, pero es bastante bueno y veo mejoras , solo espero q no lo abandonen a futuro, no cuesta probarlo , solo tu puedes dar la ultima palabra de si te gusta o no.
Greedy company, false promises, don't give this game the time of day. Let it die an unceremonious death
skins horribles que te las venden como epicas y a 2200 monedas

I poured my life into Overwatch 1 just for them to spit on it, sling it around, and rub it in the nastiest smelling play-doh these crayon eating slags could find. Do NOT support this game in any capacity, it's just a husk of something that was once worth even a passing glance.

Despite all the mess, it is the only engaging fast paced shooter in its league. Nothing else like it. Despite the weird review bombing going on here on twitter. you can pretty much pick up the game and play without spending a penny, and you can earn all the heroes through basic playtime.

(Disclaimer, have been playing since the closed beta. 1500+ hours) They want you to pay $20+ for the PVE content they falsely advertised by saying it was going to be full of skill trees and stuff. To elaborate, they want you to pay $20+ to play missions on maps that were already in the game, full of PVE robots that were already featured in other PVE content. Voiced over by existing NPCs. The campaign has nothing new except voice over. Defend a point with 3 random teammates without getting to choose your hero for 15 minutes of voice over "campaign" content. I haven't been this eye-wateringly bored in over a year. Please save me from this terrible, horrible company. (FYI the hit-reg is terrible I can't play the sniper cause I have video proof about 40% of my shots no-reg)

almost 700 hours that how much i have playing overwatch since the start at season 1.ive seen some bad times in overwatch, goats, double shield,thickcree, and even the carwash meta along with the like 6 reworks sym has gotten. but... you lied to us FOR YEARS. lied about the entire ow2 pve. drip fed us incredibly exciting teaser videos and gameplay videos of a game we would never touch. blizzard you probably had already canned the real Ow2 PVE before you even released the very first teaser for the pve talent tree and openly talked about the OVERWATCH 2 Campaign...... this... is absolutely unacceptable. ive been here all this time. ive spent so much money supporting the games development. in fact i have over 90% of all skins for every hero only missing a few event only skins or charity skins. but i as a player and as a content creator feel betrayed. im just glad i can finally say what has been on my mind openly and share my dissatisfaction with what you guys have done to us as a community.

I have to say something about this game, it's not real that Blizzard always hurt us on this game, Blizzard always hurt the poorness and just steal from our pocket
From Season 1 of OverWatch 2, I start buying the game pass of this game, but I just have some basic experience of this game, not feeling as I got more than the free playing gamer, and till now, Blizzard give just one way to got the new play mode, the sucking PVE mode? No, that's bull xxxx, I have bought last season, don't let me buy anymore in this season, I have already got the coins WHY should I could not use them for buying the new mode in this season?
Stop cheating on us!
